attributes.action: Call for a General Election in 2017. Theresa May has no mandate to govern the UK
attributes.additional_details: A General Election is the only way that democracy can be re-instated to the United Kingdom - please sign immediately and share. Thank you
attributes.background: Theresa May has no direct mandate from the United Kingdom to govern; her recent actions demonstrate that she has no intention of representing the wishes of the people of the United Kingdom in a democratic and proper manner.
